title: 32.) Top 40 Countdown - This Guy Confuses Me
description:
Lindsey is dating an erratic guy who wants to “take things slow,” but is moving fast when it comes to affection. - Dr. Laura: "Every woman should hold out for a mature, self-confident man."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
